description: Come mend those broken soles at BRC Shoe Repair and enjoy our in-house DJ's spin sets. Our 'Shady Lovers Lounge' is a lush and cushy retreat for all dusty lovers out there! For all you young and young at heart we invite you to browse our BOOTique - open daily until the goods run out!
landmark: BRC Shoe Repair Sign (large combat boot)

name: Regis
description: Need salsa? We have so much salsa. Come get salsa. Seriously, we have too much. It's Sparky's fault.
landmark: Alien mannequin on top the RV - his name is Mark.

name: Temple Guardians HQ
description: Training & educating new and veteran guardians to serve and hold space in the temple.  All burners who seek to serve are welcome.
landmark: Huge lighted sign that changes colors.

name: Kamp Kla
description: Custom Glaze Your Burning Man Ceramic Medallion, and enjoy some midday shade and hydration. We will kiln fire once home, and then send it to you at the mid-burn wherever you live in the default world
landmark: the flags of Kamp Kia

name: ESD Station 9:00
description: ESD Medical station 9 and Medical volunteer camp
landmark: Red Cross at the 9 o:clock plaza

name: Favela Culture
description: Come to drink a lots of caipirinhas, Brazilian music, house music, carnaval, art, gifts from Brazil and good vibes. Also we have an amazing schedule of Ecstatic Dance, Cocoa Ceremony and Theta Healing time. Adults and kids are welcome!
landmark: A big sign FAVELA front camp also many color flags

name: the black hole
description: Home of the Black Rock City Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department. Despite all outward evidence to the contrary - we are completely reasonable, and more or less friendly people. Come by, if it looks like home - it probably is, and boy have we got an offer for you.
landmark: spinning radar tower

name: MISFITS MMXXV
description:
The Mystical Multiverse Village - MM22
Home to the following camps; Boobs & Berries, Combobulated, Kam Kru Kool Kamp (Profiles In Dust Documentary Crew), and Rabble Rousers (home of the Sound Car Shenanigan Wagon).
And the resting place of the Beautiful Narwhal, a Burning Man relic.
Come relax on the Narwhal, enjoy a DJ, have a drink, view an amazing film and meet some amazing Burners!
landmark: The Narwhal

name: Dusty Inner Child
description: We're a fun spiritual camp / higher consciousness
landmark: Rainbow Penis (Team DIC)

name: Om Skillet
description: Om Skillet is back for its tenth burn and we're excited to bring our Gourmet Grilled Cheese restaurant back to BRC for the tenth time! Come Monday -Thursday  Lunches 12-3pm.  Stay longer on Tuesday for Tutu Tuesday dance party.
landmark: Fire pit, couches on roadside, large pastel dome.

name: LogRide support Camp
description: We would like to invite everyone to join us in "The Pines," a forest themed camp with surprises at every turn.
landmark: Forest and river near the road

name: Soul Forge
description: We encourage your "Yesh", a word that goes beyond "yes" and indicates a level of enthusiasm and excitement that promotes consent at all levels. At our camp, you'll find an interactive masculinity challenge booth and the 'ConsenTea' rainbow dome serving tea (and electrolyte recharge packets) during the day. We'll be teaching a variety of workshops from Dirty Thai massages, tantric meditation, and how to train your submissive, to magic and theater! Not to mention the sunrise pancake station, crafting station, AcroYoga, and Viking blood ceremony.
landmark: big 20x20 Rainbow Dome

name: Camp Fly
description: Home of the Mutant Vehicle insect swarm and Dragonfly Lounge.
landmark: dragonfly bar, and insect themed mutant vehicles

name: Slow, Adults @ Play
description: Bringing Playacuda, our socially interactive mutant vehichle out to the playa to share adventures with you.
landmark: silver tarp over white GMC/Arctic Fox cmper & sign

name: Apotheosis
description:
Apotheosis' mission is supporting burners integrating playa, peak, and psychedelic experiences into their daily life. People may experience more love, compassion, joy, immediacy, acceptance, self-reliance, self-expression, and community at Burning Man then they may have experienced over the past 5 years, yet if they believe this is only available on the playa, they may be leaving one of the biggest gifts of Burning Man in the dust. 

Our camp offers experiential workshops, community connections, and nourishment that support explicitly identifying the strengths and truths discovered about one's self and supporting in integrating these new awarenesses into the daily process. Many people wake up at Burning Man, we want to support the waking down process of living it in daily practice.
landmark: Name Game Prize Wheel at our Tent's Entrance

name: From Mars With Love
description: Home of our eponymous 'Mars Rover' mutant vehicle
landmark: Geodesic dome made out of foam panels

name: Blinky Repair Camp
description: Solder runs through our veins.
landmark: table and shade with camp sign next to LED ball

name: RYU
landmark: large metal RYU next to the red&black Torii gate

name: Space Potatoes
description: Overwhelmed? Feeling like a potato floating in space? Stop by to relax and reawaken your inner child with some low-key crafting. No skill required, all ages welcome!
landmark: Sign with Star Trek-style Space Potato logo

name: Pollination Station
description: Pollination Station is a workshop camp with one goal: providing detailed information regarding the proper care, proliferation, and value of insect pollinators including bees, butterflies, and moths. Want to harvest your own honey or simply enjoy more butterflies in your environment? Join us and support the 10 Principles through education and skill development!
landmark: Large white carports, white netting, bee flag/art.

name: Duane's Whirld
description:
DuanesWhirld is enjoying our 16th consecutive year en Playa, with most of our campers trekking from Vermont.  We enjoy mass-gifting our fellow Burners with Deep Playa Beer Delivery (quenching the late afternoon thirst in the heat) and 'Smores (late nights in deep playa to ease the chill with warm gooey treats.) Each of those gatherings generates micro-community among those Burners brought together.

This year, we'll field another mutant vehicle -- having launched TimeCycle ourselves while other years supporting and camping with The Bleachers, Rabid Transit and El Pulpo Mechanico.  Our new ride, Fluffy the Dream Machine, is accessible public transit masquerading as a cloud wafting across the playa.  A wheelchair lift and Braille rails accommodate Burners into the artcar experience.
landmark: Duane's Whirld faux realtor sign on the street

name: DPW Ghetto/Staff Camp
description:
this is the staff camp for the DPW.
this space is the living room for DPW  our bar is open to the public.
come on in and learn about the Department of Public Works and what it is we do for burning man
landmark: the big DPW cog on the front of our facade.

name: Divine Consciousness
description: A place to discover and celebrate the interconnectedness of our shared consciousness, learn and develop psi abilities, and work together to raise the collective projection of unconditional love.
landmark: Open meditation tent with celestial decor

name: Mo' Better Burners
landmark: Metal sculpture on curb w/ lights & big camp sign

name: ARTery Pavilion
landmark: Artery logo

name: Amour Inn
landmark: lit dream catcher tree with purple & pink lit tent

name: The Sound of Feelings
description: We believe in a better world for everyone and that the change starts with us. We are all species of a living organism and as such, we take care of one another. We heal one another, educate one another, inspire one another, give to one another, serve one another, cooperate, communicate, and collaborate. We are wired to live in a common Unity = Community. And the community is built on the frequency of love. Positioned in our TREE TENT at the center of the Tent are our stage and Art Installation TREE OF DREAMS  a large-format fantasy tree with the effect of heartbeat through illumination with 100 pairs of HEADSETS for silence and intimate events and High Fidelity's sound system that allow you to have High-frequency momentum at our fantastic camp.
landmark: Massive Portal  that guides to The Tree of Dreams

name: VALHALLA
description: The grand banquet hall of the gods, reserved for warriors who fought valiantly and have earned rest and celebration.
landmark: giant, golden tree adorned with lights

name: The Church Of No FOMO
description:
The Church Of No FOMO will help you exorcise Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) from your life! It is our mission to help you deal with Past FOMO, Present FOMO, and Future FOMO in healthy and / or impulsive ways! 

Stop by our camp for impulse legally binding weddings, improvisational re-enactments of events that you missed during the pandemic, and conversations about how to be present in diverse society.
landmark: Flag with FOMO Crossed out!

name: Consensual Abduction
description: At Consensual Abduction, you'll find a crew of stranded aliens hoping to abduct you into their luxurious spacecraft. In the daytime, come wiggle your limbs on our shady dancefloor, fuel up with a refreshing cocktail, or enjoy galactic-sized relaxation at our very own SPACESPA, which includes our big ticket spa experience: The Consensual Abduction (aren't you curious what that is?). At night, come play with our interactive LED planet, The ORB, or travel through our blacklit art portal, The Wormhole. All visitors / abductees can expect strange surprises, silly daily themes, & thoughtful gifts throughout their excursion so come connect, get weird, & let loose with us!
landmark: ORB, a 10' tall light-up sphere

name: Kosmic Kowboys
description: Kosmic Kowboys is a home for wayward Kowboys, Kosmic souls and anyone who wants to experience the old west Playa Style
landmark: Horse Tie up and swing bar doors

name: Saint Molly's Academy
description: Saint Molly Academy is the center for BRC citizens to bring out their inner child. We offer wholesome fun with an adult twist. Stop by for naptime, recess, PE classes, prom and graduation.
landmark: School bus w/ intersection letters on top

name: Popsicle Bahrrr
description: Popsicle Bahrrr is a colorful pirate themed camp with treasures for all ages. The lighthouse has colorful lights, the large canopy tent offers comfort, popsicle giveaways, inflatable furniture, a mini ball pit, and a dj!  Let's sail the seven seas!
landmark: Popsicle Bahrrr 24ft lighthouse

name: Congee Central
landmark: A tall flag that has a picture of a bowl of congee

name: COHERENCE
description: Camp Coherence it is where your heart, mind and emotions are in energetic alignment and cooperation. judgmental free zone.
landmark: 26ft Tall White Chritsmas tree

name: FWP
description: The lake lahontan semi historical society, beach club and ice cream bar is a semi-historical, sesquipedalian society celebrating the history of the playa by communing over ice cream, cold beverages and discussion of the fanciful beings that may or may not have once existed here. Come for our daily afternoon semi-historical trivia, look at our cabinet of curiosities, contribute to it with a piece of MOOP and receive special awards for who can say our camp acronym fastest, and who can spell sesquipedalian from memory.
landmark: Large Lotus mahal tent/ Captain of love art car

name: Not Ninja Camp
description: Brrrrrning Man Camp is a snow themed camp put on by the ever-shape-shifting Ninjas. The Point of No Return party on White Wednesday will have the playa's biggest (faux) snowball fight, and flashmob roving snowball fights will be around the playa. Additionally, on Tuesday, we will host a Noods on Noods on Noods event to feed the masses. Lastly, a Snoasis pop-up will pamper deep playa Brrrrrners on Thursday.
landmark: Giant Ninja kicking sign

name: NYC Deli
description:
NYC Deli: where the customer's always wrong. Think Seinfeld on playa, bodega cats included.* Take a bite out of your comedown from all-night shenanigans by stopping by at Camp NYC Deli on your way back to your camp. Let us serve you the best bodega breakfast sandwiches, coffee and tea on-playa Monday through Saturday 9am-11am. We'll gift you some NYC sass on the side! Breakfast includes: egg and cheese on bagels or rolls, bagels and cream cheese, and coffee service. Vegan and vegetarian options available! 

*Not real cats, just cool cats. We're also the cat's pajamas!
landmark: NYC Deli: Where the Customer's Always Wrong Banner

name: FOMO Camp
description:
FOMO Victims, you are looking for the best experience to live at BRC and you want to be sure to not miss anything ?
You're looking on a way to get rid of that fear to miss something ?
Come to discover and contribute to the wall of best activities of BM. 
Better than that : come and meet our team who will maybe tell you the secret to never get the FOMO anymore…
landmark: sign "FOMO Camp" on our frontage

name: C.O.R.R.U.P.T.I.O.N.
description: Did a nefarious campmate fail to cut the crusts off your sandwich? Are you sunburned and grumpy and would like to make it somebody's fault? Now for the first time citizens can file a formal grievance (real or imagined, the sillier the better) and bring the offending party to trial in a public forum, complete with highly incompetent legal counsel and draconian punishments. Stop by at any time to have a coffee at our 24/7 coffee bar, chat with the clerk, get some bad ideas, and file a grievance against some undeserving sap.
landmark: Large scaffolding with the CORRUPTION sign

name: Alight Market Village
description: Alight Market Village is a majority POC village hosting our night market style offerings, steaming hot tea, live and electronic music (together!), fire side coziness, and epic mischief making. Recalibrate Tea, Sloth Dance Society Cuddle Jungle, Honey Nut Curious, and Arising come together to invite you to our little alley of delights.
landmark: Alight sign atop 10ft shade structure

name: People of Color Camp
description: The People of Color Camp is what happens when The Muppet Show gets put in the same telepod as an episode of The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, MTV's The Real World and a debate at the United Nations.
landmark: Center Camp

name: Fuzzy purple
landmark: "fuzzy purple" sign. 2x

name: Camp Byte This
description:
BYTE is a fully immersive art experience featuring two furry and lovable robots named "Chip" and "Terra, the very first robots freed from slavery. 

Chip and Terra invite you to celebrate their liberation by climbing, dancing, snuggling and playing in their fluffy bellies  or hanging wisteria garden!

Camp BYTE This is our art support camp that welcomes everybody!! Swing by to check out our new art car "Petabyte", get some beautifully designed BYTE gifts, grab one of our special cocktails and dance your dusty butt off or get some needles poked in ya with our gifted acupuncture sessions!
landmark: A piss yellow shade structure and a shit brown bar

name: The Sound Garden
description: We are a high vibe sound camp here to delight your senses with a unique 360 degree sound system that will blow your mind. By night we bring you some of the most talented DJ's and artists to create an unforgettable experience of sound, art and performance. By day we host sound healings, deep house yoga, and listening parties of your favorite artists.  We also offer body work, a speaker series and workshops in our Squish Garden.
landmark: Pitched hexagonal, white & gold, circus tent roof

name: Ski Patrol
description: We make art
landmark: 10' diameter metal hyperboloid (big wheel)

name: Strong Tonic Center for Vitality
description: Seeking the remedy for your malady? Step right up! Our incontrovertible methods are proven(ish).
landmark: Wrapped scaff looking like snake oil sales cart.

name: Moonlight Collective
description: Scientists associated with the Moonlight Collective have been studying the phenomena known as the Prairie of Possibilities since the 1960's. It is apparently heading for the Playa; plans are under way to intercept and study this mysterious yet mesmerizing field of glowing, swaying prairie grass. Visit the Moonlight Collective Field Camp for morning tea, review their research, and record your own story to be shared with the Prairie Entity.
landmark: Ring of glowing grass surrounding a phone booth

name: The Astral Social Club
description: The transdimensional calls.
landmark: Alder forest and large street-facing murals

name: Cat Ca Phe
description: Camp Anawanna is a camp that allows you to be yourself and let your weird and frisky out. We are all inclusive and want you to spend some time in our kitty playground and be present in the Meow.  It's time to be impulsive and Kitty Diem.   We encourage everyone to let their inner Purr-sona out.  From Chonky Brits to Wild Bengals, all feline friends are welcome here.
landmark: Kitty Playpen and Tacocat Mutant Vehicle

name: Discow
description: Inclusive. Playful. Magical. Discow is a community and art car that sparks magical moments through radical creativity and play. Debuting at )'( 2022!
landmark: Glowing Discow neon sign on the large tower

name: Black Rock Piano Lounge
description:
The Black Rock Piano lounge is a place where people from all over the world come to meet, enjoy and play great live music.  We bring two of the best piano's to the playa (and tune it several times throughout the week) in one of the coolest lounges.  Live music is played by both camp members and any fellow Burner who stops by to share their talent.  Music plays 24 hours a day and we host parties throughout the week.

The magic of the Black Rock Piano Lounge is that we connect people who have never met before and create amazing live music.  Our 40 by 20 lounge is designed to be open and friendly.  We have several fist time musicians mix with experienced professionals to create a safe environment for everyone to create and share.
landmark: Big White tent/lounge & sound of live piano music.

name: Polaris
description: The Polaris motto is "Love and Care for Each Other". We're a mutant vehicle camp guided by our Northern Star. We are an international group of misfits, artists, dancers, yogis, teachers, writers, engineers, and more. All are welcome here!
landmark: Orange and Blue flags + POLARIS sign

name: Baobab Tree
landmark: Snake-wrapped Apple Signage & pop up w/ cushions

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
landmark: big, white-ish saddle tent. Can't miss it.

name: LEGENDARY Playground of the Gods
description: Legendary is a playground for learning, sharing and authentic human connection. This is a place to remember your divinity and to share your genius and unique voice and learn from others. Come and find an oasis from the desert, find rest in the shade, get frozen treats and feast on a week of inspired offerings in workshops, classes, music and entertainment designed to feed your soul. Welcome to the playground of the Gods.
landmark: Giant colorful dome filled with joyful people.

name: Camp Manatee
description: Camp Manatee - We have Imported Beer, Board Games and Snacks.
landmark: Three Carnival Tents

name: SYMBIO
description: We are a multicultural, multilingual, multidimensional community deeply rooted in the conscious ecology of Burning Man. A hive of change makers fueled by creative passion and love. Living in symbiosis with the earth as we learn to tune our bodies to the rhythms of the universe. Our efforts are to be in service of the earth and humankind as a whole. We invite you to dive in with a purpose to evolve our awareness based human flourishing and to live in symbiosis with all sentient beings.
landmark: Flag on top of our tent with our camp name SYMBIO

name: Practice Camp
description: Practice makes camp.  Practicing since 2012.  Art support for WE ARE.
landmark: Practice Camp flag

name: Chez Mirage
description: Chez Mirage is a whimsical jungle oasis in the desert. Featuring a lush jungle canopy and multiple open treehouses to climb into, our camp will help you unleash your inner animal. Come during the day to compete in wild Survivor-themed games and win prizes, or simply hydrate with fresh H2O of the coconut variety. Visit at night to escape the madness of Burning Man with warm tea and even warmer campfires.
landmark: Tiki torches, treehouses and the Chez Mirage sign

name: Proppa Cuppa
description:
Are you missing the taste of a great cup of tea? Does lukewarm coffee served with long life milk not hit the spot anymore? 

Proppa Cuppa offers an English Breakfast Tea service daily from 9-11am

Relax a little from the hustle and bustle of Black Rock City and come and enjoy a classic cup of english breakfast tea and a biscuit to start your day off on the right foot. All served with a dose of British hospitality, top hats and all!

On Tuesday and Thursday afternoon we will host an afternoon tea service with cakes to die for! What are you waiting for?
landmark: Proppa Cuppa Sign on a flag pole

name: BLM/FNW Interpretive Camp
description: Come learn about the natural and cultural history of the Black Rock Desert! We will have displays, learning activities, and experts available every day to discuss everything from local plants and animals to the Native Americans who once called the Black Rock Desert home.
landmark: large sign b/w 20' wooden posts: "BLM Interp Camp"

name: Gifter's Guild
description: This camp is about being active on the playa and seeking others for the purpose of giving our self made high quality gifts along with wonderful conversations allowing us to show value and kindness to others. Reaching OUT is the order of the day!
landmark: Address. Camp decorations are not determined yet.

name: Tough Titties
description: Tough Titties is an art support camp for The Apocalypse is Breathtaking, the flaming wishing tree near the temple. We previously brought the other moon to playa. Come to us to bounce titties and trade stories on builds, burns and butt stuff.
landmark: Large See through Titties

name: The Interstrange
description: No one's a stranger at the Interstrange.  We are a lounge, primarily, with activities, classes, and workshops every day.  Feel free to stop by any time if you want a place to relax.

name: The Alpaca Pakka Family
description:
Xanadu
A place to meet friends, relax, heal, and commit to intentions.
landmark: Xanadu flag

name: Vortex 4
description: We don't have green bread or a flying stone head, but we do have Cecil the Flying Propeller Beanie. Pop by for a ride! Or get some "free psychiatric help" at the Lucy Booth: all advice guaranteed to be disdained, disavowed, or disallowed by the AMA, APA, and your CPA. Take pictures of yourself and your friends at our Playa Postcard photo-op spot.
landmark: Lucy's psychiatric help booth from Peanuts comics

name: Mah Na Mah Na
description:
Can your fingers survive Mouse Trap Roulette? Do you want to build a LED crown so your friends find you? Wanna vote for the Playa's best chocolate spread? Well, come visit for some belly laughs.

MahNaMahNaCamp@gmail.com
landmark: White picket fence

name: Camp Just Ahead
description: We're an international group of photographers and other visual artists who want to meet you and celebrate how YOU make Black Rock City what it is! Come spin our "Wheel of Indeterminate Immediacy" to choose an activity for us to do together. It could be an impromptu gifted photo shoot, a playa game, silly hijinks, a deep conversation -- who knows? So, embrace Immediacy by getting on your bike RIGHT NOW and come see us! And get distracted by 10 other camps along the way! It's fine. We'll still be here.
landmark: Large monkey hut with lamp posts at the entrance

name: Agave Lounge
description: Kick off your dusty boots, shake your tassels, and let us knock your socks off as you enter a realm of geometric architecture with a xerophytic mentality. Featuring a 70ft geodesic dome and a Void Sound System pumping the latest and greatest in disco beats. We invite all to dance, and lounge in the squish with friends, new and old. For those 21 and over stop by our featured bar to sip delicious agave tequila and premium craft cocktails, kombucha, and other spirits. Never get bored again -join us for extracurriculars including twerk and jazzercise classes, tequila and mezcal tastings, and weather permitting, a tethered hot air balloon ride for the best view of our hometown, Black Rock City.
landmark: 70ft geodesic dome with a giant laser on top

name: Yummy yummy
description: Scumptous build camp
landmark: The Yummy yummy sign

name: Camp PtP - The Clock Ship Tere
description: Home port and mutant vehicle support camp for the Clock Ship Tere and her crew who have been sailing the playa regularly since 2010.
landmark: large, domed, white fabric, shade structure.

name: Home
description:
Hōme (Camp) is an intimate canvas, a place to which friends, old and new, return. 
Hōme "Sunset Spa at Hōme" Lounge is filled with vibey music, spontaneous treats and even treatments (from fish foot baths and cold towels, to 'quick fix' neck and shoulder massages that will be offered by one of the many 'Homies' who hang out there). From 3pm - 6pm on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday friends (everyone obviously) will be able to pop in and enjoy a sunset spa treatment of their choice.
landmark: The "archway frontage with "Hōme" on the front

name: Solo Solos camp
description:
We are pleased to present Motohiko Kamimura's work "DIVIDED FACE".
Also, each member is doing Self-expression.
landmark: Our camps fly their own flag.

name: Curios
description: The Honey Nut Curios are a delightful band of weirdos camping with the Alight Market Village. We're a tight knit, year round community of seasoned Burners who love to gift interactive experiences that put smiles on the faces of others. We strive to be the highlight of someone's evening by offering strange and delightful experiences that are exactly what you didn't know you needed. Our offerings include: Playa Shoe Shine, Costume Kintsugi, a Warming Hut, Cacao ceremonies and of course, the Honey Nut Curios Serial Cereal Bar Bar.
landmark: overhead "Alight" sign lit by lanterns

name: San Marco Square
description: Lose yourself with the Lost Boyz! Each morning we will serve coffee/tea to travelers and read fun facts about animals over our PA system. We host a live podcast, Hogg Talk, centered around audience participation and bonding over shared experience. Around noon, we break out the frozen bananas for passersbys. Each day campmates will teach their talents to the community; participate in salsa lessons from a semi-professional  dancer to Ju-Jitsu lessons from professional practitioners. During the evenings we have several big name DJs committed to playing live sets on our stage for themed parties; The longer one stays in our camp the harder it will be for them to recall their former life; leave grown up responsibilities behind for good!
landmark: 5' lit up star at the street and on bar with sign

name: Slippery Tentacles
description: Peter "Hoochie" Hazel and his Artsy Fartsy crew bringing you the Shark and Sunflowers for 2022.
landmark: Green mosaic snake at frontage

name: NOMMOS
description: Nommos Village welcomes The Nommos Ancestral "Alien" worshipped by the Dogon people of Mali. Join us while Nommos and Dogon Tribe burn together at Nommos Village.
landmark: Nommos Mutant Vehicle, Shalah and Big Chill Area.

name: Dusty Daruma Dojo
description: Daruma art installation support camp. Have an intention to set or need some accountability partners to accomplish an existing goal? Come find us!
landmark: Dusty Daruma Dojo flag within Lost + Found village

name: HeckleBerries
description: Do you love ranting, raving, heckling, and being obnoxious? Do you love fresh organic berries? How about both… The HeckleBerry Camp is a place where you can get some fresh berry cocktails, roast your bartender with our megaphones, and have constructive educational conversations on consent! Join us for workshops, heckle competitions, movement, and…. BERRIES!
landmark: Large berry flag

name: Brainiac
description: Hop on the Brainiac and take a ride to Somewhere Else! We go to Lots of Places and we might take you there! We operate like a taxi and we are happy to take you (and maybe even your stuff) on whatever errand you've got. Let's have an adventure.... where are we going?  We are open most of the time, driving the car around, day and night. We hope you stop by!
landmark: two large purple flagpoles which are our entrance

name: Neodebauchery
description: We are a throng of dome-dwelling miscreants, hooligans, bloviators, simps, warlocks, horse girls, diggerfish, and charlatans. As one of the aforementioned groups, your birthright compels you to complete the pilgrimage to the fabled land of Neodebauchery.  A melange of tomfoolery new and old, Neodebauchery provides a welcoming space for weirdos of all creeds, colors, and degree of crustiness. Come gyrate to the soothing, yet somehow also abrasive melodies of our human-DJ chimeras, witness visual distortion unlike you have seen (since your last burn) with our procedurally generated Digital Domeflesh, and participate in our daily sinful activities.
landmark: big silver geodesic dome next to a rainbow tent.

name: Camp By Chance
description:
Camp By Chance, your cozy new home away from home full of
friendly faces, helpful hands and kind creatures.  We host the infamous Burning
Mouth Hot Sauce Bar featuring sauces from mild to spicy HOT. Homegrown Scary Margarita, Latte Muerte, Bourbon Ghost, Papaya Habanero and the Reaper are offered. Residents are free to venture as far up the heat ladder as they dare. All the while grooving to funky classic tunes for a spicy dance party in your mouth and in the street.  Tears of heated joy are common. If visitors are looking for a less spicy, more relaxed vibe, they can come find their zen at a guided art meditation. Stop by to find your spicy zen!
landmark: 5x20' high flagpoles & Burning Mouth hot sauce bar

name: Interrobang‽
description: Are you out of your mind?!
landmark: Light up Interrobang symbol (?!)

name: Spartan Martians
description:
Spartan Martians!  Crew of the mighty Robot Warrior.  One part Robot, One part Warrior, all Heart!  No, not that artcar.  No, not that one either.  Seldom in port, we can often be found sailing the high seas of BlackRock.  
    On this episode: Will General Disarray finally lose his mind? Did Captain Space Kitten pack their Magic Underwear?  Why is Major Bastard so damned grumpy this morning?  Corporal Punishment claims she's sorry....but is she reaaally sorry?  With special guest appearances by the entire Gay Lightning Crew.
landmark: "Spartan Martian" sign

name: Camp Nebula
description: An art support camp for Fractaled Mind. Visit us at camp or on playa!
landmark: Camp Sign in front of large shade structure

name: Bitchin Deepthroats and Backshots
description:
Hungry, horny, and happy? Well, stop by and we can take care of all three needs. Come get noods for nude with camp Bithchin' Noodle Shop. We serve up hot dishes and spicy attitudes so make a reservation with our hostess cause our wifi is down-or is it ? Come celebrate our 2nd year with us as we spread our wings and establish ourselves as a new camp. So, if you like fresh herbs and vegetables served with broth and noodles come eat with us!
Hometown: Denver
landmark: noodle shop sign

name: Mimosa
description: Hey you, yes you our dear friend! I know what you want, or I would say even need. A fresh, cold MIMOSA. Please step by our bar where we will get you what you need.
landmark: Bar with Mimosa sign at the front

name: Glow Job
description: Glow Job comes alive at night on playa. Psychedelic neon art, sculpture and personal beauty services. Visit our glowing blacklight art and beauty salon after sunset while you get ready for late night playa adventures. Blow your mind while you get your nails done. Get your face painted then melt it off. We are LGBTQ+.
landmark: Neon sculpture garden and salon

name: Chain Reaction
description:
Ever get a flat tire in Deep Playa and feel like you'll never get back to camp? We're here to help! Our camp "Chain Reaction" has daily mobile bicycle repair teams with our logo and motte: "Break 'N Fix!" With some serendipity your Playa miracle awaits you!

If you would like to get involved, no experience is necessary as we go by the DIY model of "see one, do one, teach one." Come by our camp to meet us. 

Happy (dusty) trails!
landmark: Our logo and name will be on a banner.

name: Starship Aquarius
description:
In August 2022, Starship Aquarius spotted the lights of the Playa from space and landed. It had been traveling intergalactically, seeking living beings prepared to ascend. The Starship's crew of Mood Boosters set up camp with a mission: to elevate the vibrations of the denizens of Black Rock City.
The idea with Starship Aquarius is to be a part of the journey, not a destination itself — we don't try to keep people in, but rather give them what they need to have their vibrations elevated and then return to the rest of their day or night. For some, this is just a 5 minute dance session. For others, it might be an hour-long series starting with arts and crafts and ending with journaling. Whatever you need to get a boost, the Starship supports.
landmark: Disco balls at the three peaks of the Lotus Tent

name: Illumina Radiata Art Support Camp
landmark: Street entry arch metal letters "Illumina Radiata"

name: Famous In Japan
description: At "Barbie's Closet" we're here to help you level up your Playa outfit. We offer 24 hour access to our closet of clothes, which is updated twice a day with new clothing. Our skilled campers in sewing and clothing design will be available to help you fix, repair, and alter your Playa wear during our scheduled clinics.
landmark: Always lit inside at night, racks of clothing

name: KSA Disco Katz
description: Pounce by for a furrocious pawty in our gLitter box disco pyramid, enjoy a meowmosa to some funky house on Friday morning, swing by to create your own tiny hat to make you the pop all over the desert, and for the Madonna fans out there who happen to have a soft spot for house and daquiri's we have just the thing: MaDaquiri Hour on Tuesday. Purr... HISS HISS!!! Purrr......
landmark: 12ft pyramid on the corner with cathead disco ball

name: Cyborg Mazu
description:
Mazu Camp from Taiwan offers Burners: Wood, fire, earth, metal, and water. In the East, the five elements of nature mutually balance & interact with one another and are a way of life in traditional Chinese medicine for wellness. The different elements correspond to colors and internal organs: wood is blue, corresponding to the liver; fire is Red, corresponding to the heart; earth is yellow, corresponding to the spleen; and metal is white, corresponding to the lungs. 

Join Taiwan's Mazu Camp for wellness workshops (or open mic/performances) integrating mind, body and spirit. Join us for events throughout the day with offerings such as:  relaxation/grounding exercises, drumming circles, dance movement, tea, sound bath, colors, music...
landmark: We will have our flag  on top of our temple dome.

name: BORSCH CAMP
description:
Borsch Camp we unite people around the pot of delicious borsch. 
We preach Borscherinian culture – hospitality, deliciousness and 
friendliness.
landmark: luminous BORSCH CAMP and scorpion with a cauldron

name: CounterCulture
description:
CounterCulture's mission is to we will provide important interaction with BRC residents to encourage them to participate in the after-Burn Census survey, where valuable data is collected that has assisted the Burning Man Organization with planning and permitting.

Displays will provide visitors with an array of Census data that has been collected during past Burns. The camp will also feature Census-themed artwork created by campers to celebrate the spirit of the Black Rock City Census team.
landmark: Pink and black BRC Census logos on banners/decor

name: Playa Jack Rabbits Dusty Hole Bar
description: Hope on in for a dusty jackrabbit drink, try a spin of our Gypsy Wheel and share your dare with the bar!
landmark: Jack Rabbit Ears on signage with event tent

name: The Blackbird Bus
description: The Blackbird Bus is an Art Car from Philadelphia which now resides in Los Angeles. We have been operating for ten years and do events year round in Southern California. Come by our bar and lounge or take an art tour cruise across the playa with us!
landmark: Blackbird Bus Sign and Art Car

name: ShitStorm 2.0
description:
White Toyota Matrix and Little White Fiberglas Burro Trailer.
A large insect made of recycled materials will be on top of a pole on the streetside.
landmark: White mini travel trailer BURRO, and white toyota

name: Never Past Bedtime Land
description: Where Bad Decisions are Executed Well.
landmark: NEON NPBL SIGN and TWIN PYRAMID SHADE STRUCTURES

name: Black Rock Academy
description: "BLACK ROCK ACADEMY" - the camp formerly known as "Black Rock Chinese Academy" has rebranded to embody the inclusive spirit of our members. Your friendly neighborhood spot to hang out, fire spin and shoot the shit.  Part of this year's new Multicultural POC neighborhood - come and hang with us!
landmark: Chalkboard Gold Painted Sign + LED Arrow.

name: Bunny Ranch
description:
Welcome to the heart of Bunnydom on playa, where the Billion Bunny March originates on Thursday afternoon! 
Daily the Hotmessday Café welcomes one and all to relax, enjoy herbal tea, and cool off in our shade. Nightly enjoy a cocktail while perusing the exotic collection of unusual marine life at Wayne's Discount Tropical Fish. Plus we've a collection of fun activities including the Can I Touch Your Butt Shack; the Snackfood Gloryhole; and the Dirty Laundromat Confessional. But wait, there's more! Come Tuesday or Wednesday evenings for our sort-of secret) Rabbit Hole Squeakeasy!
landmark: Big bunny head and carrot fence

name: Fractoids Garden
description: Fractoids Garden is the fruits of the "Fractal Droid" Art Installation featuring one of the highest-fidelity sound systems at Burning Man! Come experience a plethora of bass and deep-house artists. Vibe in our chill-out spaces when your not on the dance floor. We offer an elixir bar with ceremonial grade cacao and herbal tonics to keep you galactivated and hydrated on playa. For those interested in performance arts workshops, sound healing, meditation and relaxation workshops - stop by our dome and level-up with the diverse workshops at our camp!
landmark: Fractoid Stage by "Fractal Droid" Art Installation

name: High Maintenance Entertainment
description:
Camp High Maintenance is the supporter of the Bioluminescent Slug mutant vehicle. 
http://camphighmaintenance.org
We happily provide trips around the playa, Art Tours and hope to be part of BAIT this year.
landmark: big blue eyeball.

name: Sound Cabin
description: The Sound Cabin Art Car
landmark: Green Umbrellas

name: Cosmic Giggle
description:
Welcome to Cosmic Giggle! We are burners spanning from NYC to the Bay and crossing continents to London and Beirut. Our name is inspired by an experimental documentary that explores the expansive energy field that we, together, create. One thing is for sure, it can get pretty random! Here's what we have in store for you this year:

We've got a gym! Who said being Playa meant missing out on your pump up?
We've got classes! Sweat it out to our Cosmic HIIT, stretch it out to our sunset yoga.
We've got a bar! We will rehydrate you with electrolytes, or further dehydrate you with a shot of liquor…though beware: we may make you work for it!
We've even got croquet and  an oasis for those looking to keep heart rates mellow. Both are wayyy cosmic! 

So come on: Enter our Cosmos. Have a Giggle!
landmark: Our 30' dino, Freddy, and at night, our camp sign!

name: Equilibria
description:
A journey into Equilibria. 

Each human who walks through our camp has the opportunity to experience a life with more balance. To embody it. To experience it in a multi-sensory fashion. To feel inspired by a different perspective on how we can live, work and play. What does being in balance feel like? What is the cost of being out of balance?  And most importantly, how may we leverage and contribute to ancient and modern technologies to rebalance our relationship with our Planet for the mutual wellbeing and sustainable growth of all living beings?
landmark: Look for the Libra symbol flying on our flag: ♎︎

name: Playa Beignet Love Project
description: Beignet Love Project.
landmark: New Orleans - Mardi Gras - themed decor

name: ICARUS Spaceport
description: Space coffee in the mornings, Space music in the afternoons. At night, just Space.
landmark: Orange construction/safety sign that says ICARUS

name: Send Noods
description: Come send a Noodle Gram to your friends on playa! We have a chill space to rest your weary noodle, rituals to join our squad, and oodles of noodley fun.
landmark: "Send Noods" Giant Archway and Green Pool noodles

name: Gilded. Golden Snake Art Support
description: The official den for those who have created and support the Gilded snake art installation. Got questions about the art? Come visit us. We are not a pit of vipers.
landmark: Flag stating: 'Gilded' over a snake image.

name: KAHVE
description:
Overstimulated? Sit in the shade with some fine TURKISH COFFEE or TEA. When you're finished, we'll share what your grounds or leaves say about the future. 

Before leaving, take a VIAL OF SPICES to wear on a necklace in case you happen upon a sushi bar or taco truck in the deep playa. 

Be sure to come back Wednesday at 4:00 for the big BIRTHDAY PARTY!
landmark: Lighted KAHVE sign and turkish/arabic flags

name: Hydration Station
landmark: 2 big white car canopies bordering the road.

name: Galactic Relay
description: The spaceport of love on the playa.  Home base of Out Of Band III and Zodiac.  Location of the Intergalacticly famous bar, The Crocodile Milking Table.
landmark: Green mutant vehicle & airplane mutant vehicle

name: SUMANAH
description:
Cafetopia is a cafe which hosts a morning-ritual offering interactive experiences with mindfulness practices focusing on fun daily topics. While serving coffee to our Burning Man citizens, we'll be raffling off an experience only a handful will get to participate in: A restful night or day at our camp in our custom-built solar reflective A-frame structure.
Come get your day started off on the right-dusty foot at Cafetopia!
landmark: large cafe "OPEN" sign on the curb

name: Tabula Rasa
description: Tabula Rasa means blank slate. Blank slate can be a fresh start, a new beginning, rebirth! Whether you are starting or ending your day or just want to step away and take a breather come by Tabula Rasa for morning lemonade and cold brew, afternoon yoga, and night DJS and dance parties then carry on your burning man journey. We are inclusive to all!
landmark: The Big Dome & Wood Crafted Stage

name: Camp Starstruck
landmark: large illuminated 'AEZ' LED display on a tower

name: The Love Beacon
description: The 55 foot tall Love Beacon promotes a healthy, happy burn and delivers warmth, refreshment, and energy to all who find it.
landmark: 55' LED MV beacon. Wht/blu rv w reflectix/grn tape

name: Kosmik Dust
landmark: Illuminated orange Kosmik Dust rotating sign

name: Camp Plug In and Play
description: Camp Plug In and Play is the home base for Daisy the world's largest solar powered tricycle and Prosthesis the giant electric 100% human piloted mech suit. We encourage everyone to come by and plug in to what we've got going on.
landmark: The electrical outlet sign (I_I)

name: Cheezy Pix
description: Grilled cheese, iced tea, and professional portraits!
landmark: sign that says Cheezy Pix!

name: Camp Orange Heart
description:
Our camp is founded on the principles of unconditional love, mutual respect, honesty, trust, and transparency. Our goal is to provide a deeper intimacy among all human beings with respect to the eight types of intimacy: physical, emotional, spiritual, intellectual, experiential, conflict, creative, and sexual. No drama type of camp - only love, respect, and acceptance!
Email: camporangeheart@gmail.com
LGBTQIA+ Welcoming
We incorporate the Burning Man Project's Radical Inclusion, Diversity, & Equity (R.I.D.E.) Anti-Racism Pledge at our camp.
landmark: LGBTQ+ Flag and Orange & White Recovery Flags

name: The Misfits Garage
description:
A BIPOC/LGBTQ-friendly Mutant Vehicle Camp

Please come ride with us. 

Feel free to stop by and chat about what it takes to build mutant vehicles and keep them running during Burning Man!
landmark: 20 foot butterfly and juke joint

name: Mule Town
description: MuleTown: the home of three hugely inventive, yet modestly sized mutant vehicles. MuleTown welcomes you to stop by anytime for engaging MV dialog and the occasional MV or Skoolie seminar.
landmark: Visible sign stating: MULETOWN @ the st. entrance

name: Artist Base
description:
Everything you can imagine is real. We are a diversified and interactive village full of eccentric artists and creators who joined forces to spark an innovative experience on the Playa -with 4 mega art cars and 4 domes: Sound Dome, Burncade, Dusty Gym & Gratitude Tent. Join our top notch sunrise parties and enhancing speaknotes by technologists of the new age in our Sound Dome, play a few games in our Burncade, schedule yourself a work out in our Dusty Gym, or light a candle/give gratitude in our mini temple made of Moroccan Altars.  At any time, you can come across our art cars loading burners for tours of the Playa: PlayaHopper Space Shuttle/MetaPlaya SpaceShip/Majestik/Good Vibes Steam Punk
At Artist Base, we celebrate the true spirit of the artist in its purest form.
landmark: Look for the yellow neon thunder sign.

name: White Elephant Exchange
description: Tiki Bars and Tool Belts is the support camp for the Funkadelephant Mutant Vehicle. We're brought together by our love of building things, and taking those things both very seriously, and also very leisurely. Come by to visit An Abundance of Caution, or come find the Funkadelephant wandering the Playa. Aloha!
landmark: Green elephant mutant vehicle; TBTB sign

name: The Drunken Palm
description: As burners bike up to our colorful camp, they will be welcomed by energetic beats, heckles from a megaphone, and a number of ways to enjoy our camp. Come play cornhole, relax in our shady hammocks, or join us Monday / Wednesday / Friday afternoon for some drinks, dancing, and fun beats! We'll be hosting our very own DJs who will be spinning funky jams, house, and some old school hip hop. We are the perfect lil' oasis you didn't know you were looking for.
landmark: Palm trees and bright green triange shade mesh

name: SomeDay Isle ...
description:
Tiki Bar Inspiration Desination and Late Night Orientation Staytion. We encourage you to find your dreams. 

In our community we are working to establish positive connections.  We identify mentors who are willing to be cheerleaders and advisors to those in need. The mentors help others overcome obstacles and clarify and achieve their dreams. 

On the playa we are the home of the Wishing Willow Dream Tree and the Pineapple of DUSTiny. We are a fun, creative, engaging band of responsible hooligans.
landmark: Tiki Torches, Fire Poofer & Hula Skirts

name: TEA CAT
description: Ever been curious about what it's like to bring your parents to Burning Man? Come to our multi-generational camp for a cup of hot tea and good conversation. Pop-up acro-yoga sessions offered. Ukrainian-American-Canadian camp.
landmark: Cat with a tea cup

name: Frecuencia
description: A space to explore the beginning and future of Tech & Art, where luminaries, experts, and big dreamers in these worlds share their creations and the imaginations that led to them, inspiring us to think outside of the boundaries we may have put onto ourselves.
landmark: Amphitheater

name: Le Café Gaulois
landmark: Big Obelix Flag

name: Black Rock City's Cleanest Camp
description: Black Rock City's Cleanest Art Car
landmark: The 2 story tall Scrubbing Bubble

name: OHM - One Hot Mess
description: Come by and say hi to OHM - One Hot Mess and home of the Steely T Mutant Vehicle
landmark: Large Metal turtle art car

name: Playa Hopper
description: Come Join us in celebrating the spirit of the artist, during our amazing sunrise and sunset parties. Better yet be part of our SpeakNote series, on the creative process of the artist. If deep playa is your thing, hop on the PlayaHopper Space Shuttle, and get ready to be entertained.
landmark: Neon thunder sign Welcome to Artist Base Village

name: Level Up +
description: We are a nerdy themed camp bringing cosplay, roleplay, nerdy conversation, and fun interactivity to playa. Are you feeling lost in this vast desert, do you struggle to find meaning in the dust? Our NPC's are here to guide you in your quest to obtain the 10 principles and discover your best playa self. Come take a long rest in our shade, enjoy a potion at the stinky wizard alchemy bar, and renew your strength. Watch out for goblins and raiders tho.
landmark: D4 through D12 lit decorations on up-post.

name: Avant Garden
description: Holon Village is building an interactive, multi-module sensory experience for Burning Man. We believe in creating systems that empower radical self-reliance while taking advantage of the utility of communal effort. We are a mix of veteran and new Burners, all of whom share an excitement to build an amazing experience for ourselves, each other, and other Burners.
landmark: Multi-module, highly-reflective structure

name: Organic Mindz Tribe
description: Advanced technology, ancient futuristic beliefs, ideologies and social concepts are encouraged and celebrated.We offering motivation, empowerment, resources, tips and tricks to help grow your vision. All things primitive, indigenous, and tribal are the hallmark of the movement. The future is spiritual enlightenment; this camp will help enrich the people that are in need of guidance in their begin stages of awareness, bridging the gap of the metaphysical and physical constructs. We aim to show ways to adapt to social constructs by teaching the ways of spiritual enlightenment, health education and trauma healing. An aspect of our village will consist of our sound floor, the feeling of bass rising up from your feet helps you feel more deeper in tune with the music and with yourself.
landmark: Dance floor w. pyramid mesh structure above it

name: Critical Connections
description:
We'll build an entire theater experience! The style is the "creepy carnival" and the "actors" are actually puppets that will use popular philosophical theme to interact with the participants (imagine a puppet that realize there's a new reality outside the stage, and try to interact with the people watching the show to understand how these reality works). During the morning the camp mates will build and coach on how to build puppets.

The "Wall of Frames" will make the night time highly interactive without the need to any camp mates to do anything. A fully "self service" experience that is available at night at any time.
landmark: Big Puppet Theater & the wonderful Wall of Frames

name: Art Masel
description: Come get dry-cleaned by our turbocharged air compressor. We'll get the dust out your hair and anywhere else.
landmark: Neon Pink sign that says: Art Mazal

name: Mutant Wranglers
description: A Mutant Vehicle Support Camp using artwork to make you THINK. Maybe even ACT.
landmark: Pair of scaffolding towers and giant Bison Skull!

name: Dark Side of OZsome
description: Wizard of Oz meets Dark Side of the Moon. Daily Psy-chill shade lounge - hot & cold apple cider, chill music. Outdoor game area - Giant twister, Corn hole, Broom croquet. Witches Ball, Movie night, Toto and Twisted Sister day. Photo ops with OZ props.
landmark: Large Ruby Slippers prop in front of camp

name: Good Vibes Only
description: Come build an ongoing community co-created art piece celebrating gratitude, or stop by at sunsets for a beautiful live instrument performance. Who knows, you might even receive a surprise gift.
landmark: Neon thunder sign Welcome to Artist Base Village

name: IntraNurture Art Support Camp
description: IntraNurture, meaning to nurture from within, is an INTERACTIVE, INNOVATIVE sculpture that fuses large-scale ART with HEALING TECHNOLOGY. The wings of the enchanting 16' tall x 42' wide, color-changing eagle creates an inviting embrace to welcome participants toward a healing voyage located within the eagle's body. Just below the eagle's beak is the entrance to the Heart Chamber. This 9' x 9' decorative and intimate space is where participants interact with multi-sensory (visual, aural, and tactile) immersive, sound, light, and somatic technology that has been calibrated to initiate a communion with "radical self nurturance."
landmark: flag with eagle icon IntraNurture logo

name: Lucid Dreams
description: Lucid Dreams is all about becoming aware of your dreams. We've created a safe space to create new dreams with others. With a projection dome to teleport you to natural environments from around the globe, we strive to stimulate your visual, audio and scent senses. We also have a wacky tea party dome with select teas and treats for you to stimulate your taste senses as well.  Come and relax with other burners and learn about what your dreams mean in our dream books. We hope you come dream with us and your fellow burners!
landmark: Two big domes with Lucid Dreams between them

name: Blank Slate
description: A place of refuge for bicycles in need of tender love, repair, and affection! A new beginning for you, your bicycle, your life and subsequent love for it, made possible in part by booze, butts and bikes!
landmark: Geodesic dome in front of broad semi truck

name: Big Ding Energy
description: Big Ding Energy has finally made it to the Playa to provide wind wing lessons to the citizens of Black Rock City. We couldn't find a truck big enough to bring a lake but learning how to wing on a variety of wheeled vehicles is going to be just good enough. Love speed and adrenaline? Hate having skin on your knees? Come on by for daily wing lessons and bacon grilled cheese. Stretching and warmups will be provided so come by early and make sure your fit and ready to rip!
landmark: Pink Parachute and Wind wings hanging in front

name: the tryst
description: https://gofund.me/074ef442
landmark: mirrored pyramid

name: Karaoke Kafe
description: Get your inner singer on with us at Kamp Karaoke! We provide LIVE BAND (and standard digital)asX back-up for you and your friends.
landmark: Big Blue Tent

name: Funky Town
description: A welcoming, neighborhood corner of Black Rock City with funky, groovy, sexy beats; sensational cocktails; we invite you to bring over a chair and chill and connect with your fellow citizens of Black Rock.
landmark: Giant shade structure blowing in the wind

name: DIPTOWN
description: Diptown is the art support camp for the DIPTOWN art object, a whole town buried in the dust to the roofs.
landmark: luminous DIPTOWN sign made of light bulbs

name: Insomnophilia
description: Wake up! We are camp "Insomnophilia." We get off on being awake! Especially at night. We want to awaken you physically, mentally, and metaphysically. We offer midnight coffee, Irish coffees, and ceremonial knighting to celebrate the darkness and fight off sleep. We also know a lot about insomnia and will teach you. All are invited and encouraged to come be nocturnal creatures with us!
landmark: Flag Pole and Two Open Eyes

name: Majestik
description: Keep the child in you alive and join us at the Burncade, 24H, and play games that will take you back in time.
landmark: Neon thunder sign Welcome to Artist Base Village

name: Camp NeverLeave
description: Camp NeverLeave invites you down a mysteriously lit corridor of murals that open up to a custom floating fire pit. Then you must chose:  the corridor to your left will draw you in with music and dancing, but wander to your right and find an icy sculpture in the cool shade.
landmark: white glowing walls in a Y shape from above

name: The Homie Depot
description: An escape room camp for Burning Man!
landmark: border/fence of orange construction barrier

name: Meta Playa
description: Looking to get your blood moving, come join us at the Dusty Gym for a quick workout, playa style.
landmark: Neon thunder sign Welcome to Artist Base Village

name: Vibe Check
description: Our small oasis provides a cool respite from a long day or night on the playa. Our mornings provide a shaded space for all, with yoga sessions with our certified yoga instructor, unique Hypnotic transformative bliss with our Reiki Master and Hypnospecialist, and always tea and coffee are on hand. We provide a vibe that connects the community through participation, inclusion, giving, laughter and a positive, energetic spirituality that connects all of us. Special evening social events, drinks and food, keep us all nourished on this sacred space we call home.
landmark: 10 foot green alien at the entrance

name: DREAM with Me Forest
description: Dream with Me Forest art support camp.   This camp houses the crew of the Dream with Me Forest.
landmark: The 10 foot steel tree with bird cut outs

name: BlockHaus
description: This is the base of operations for the BlockHaus Mutant Vehicle.
landmark: Giant Mutant Vehicle (or large open space)

name: B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse
description: BED is a camp all about consent and making sure everyone on playa is consensually aware! Come visit us and talk about consent with one of our volunteers. Or stop by and hang out in our lounge, it's a safe place to chill, dance, or even get a little crazy!
landmark: Large BED Buttons

name: Wise Tribe Camp
description: To hold a sacred space, where all are welcome, that contains the highest intention of personal, collective, and planetary healing. We will invite Indigenous Elders, Native American Medicine Men, and Community Leaders to teach about sustainability, spiritual ecology, and how to preserve biodiversity.
landmark: Follow the light until the big W in the corner

name: Camp Shoshana
description: Camp Shoshana is where you see everything in rose-colored glasses. Come enjoy our rose garden at night.
landmark: Digital Rose Garden Art

name: Radiant Seed
description:
Radiant Seed is a temple devoted to radical ritual and reimagining our relationship to the wild. Radiant Seed is specifically attuned to elemental sacred expression and the cultivation of primal instinct through embodied devotional practices. 

Our offering to the playa is the Temple of the Black Sun. Here, you will encounter interactive ceremonies and radical rituals that promote aliveness at all levels, as well as alignment with the energetics and body of the Earth. Ceremonies and activations will be offered twice daily at sunrise and sunset to explore the energies of the threshold and what that space might hold. 

Come experience and explore your true nature with us.
landmark: Anahasana Village Sign

name: RestART
description:
Semper Ardens welcomes new Burners to immerse into the culture of Burning Man. Our mission is to extend the ethos of the playa to everyone, but especially into the hearts and minds of those who are leaders in businesses and creative communities around the world.

Lessons learned here are priceless gifts: inspiration, creative vision, endless possibility, self-realization, and awareness of how the world can work from a completely unique perspective. 

The Semper Ardens Liquid Lab will feature a variety of plant-based elixirs and concoctions to create an uplifting wellness-oriented experience for discerning visitors.

Join us 2-4 pm daily for programming based around the 10 Principles. Yes, you can integrate what you've learned here into your regular life!
landmark: Semper Ardens illuminated sign and flags.

name: NoseTradamus
description:
Welcome to Nock Nockamp, where you can come and use your worst, best and most ridiculous jokes and on liners, to win dad-joke battles!

Stop by everytime you in the mood for a giggle!
landmark: We don't have one yet..

name: NYC Community Container
description: We Guarantee Nothing!  But you'll probably pick up your gear from us if you're from NYC/NJ
landmark: 5 53' hi-cube shipping containers

name: Camp Sonder
description: Serving premium teas 24/7 in a warm, wholesome environment.
landmark: red light chandeliers

name: Brewed Awakening
description: If you think you can just coast through life you're sadly mistaken. We're here to show you that your life is happening whether you're conscious of it or not, and hey, when you're done reflecting, here's a coffee to wake you up!
landmark: Sign with the brewed awakening logo.

name: FUC-Kezhan
landmark: a large sign of black background "FUC Kezhan"

name: ROCA
description: Come reach higher places as you climb the Roca!
landmark: 20x20 Climbing Wall

name: Deep Orbit
description: Deep Orbit is an Art Support Camp. Talk to us about Art!
landmark: Merkaba Star Sculpture

name: Seraphim
description: "Seraphim" Art Support Camp
landmark: Silver Angel

name: Hanging Gardens of BRC
description: an open space to get away from the sun.  Rest from peddling around.  or just somewhere to hang out and meet lovely people
landmark: Green tarp covering and tall green leaves in front

name: BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES BUS STOP!
description: Providing accessible art tours in our adventure rig, with room for about 10 - 16 Burners, leaving from our BUS STOP! art installation on the Playa. Tours go 2x most days for about 1.5hrs, see http://www.blackrockadventures.org for more!
landmark: Tall Grey Feather Flag with a big " ! "on it

name: Bad Education
description: Because what you learn here can't be any worse than what they are teaching these days in the real world!
landmark: Eagle on top of a flag

name: Misfit toys
landmark: trees made of lights

name: Joulery
description: Joulery is the home base for Joule the art car.  Come visit us at camp, and if we're not there we hope you find us roaming the playa.  Come dance with us or ride around to tour art.  Joule is a brilliant crystal cluster with ever-changing colored gems bursting out in all directions.
landmark: Joule art car, a cluster of LED gems.

name: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr
description: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr brings you The Grandmother Tree art installation and hosts large format printmaking workshops. All under the shiny, glymbrry glow of a lunar arch while sipping on on some good shrubble. Stop on in to chillax in our Sensory Space or take advice from the Joy Generator!
landmark: Phases of Moon Arch by Scaffolding w/ 2 Silk Flags

name: O.G.P.Z.
description: Don't spill your drink at the Petting Zoo! Come join the party at one of Black Rock City's old school favorite bars! We welcome all dusty travelers (over 21 of course). Bring your own cup for a taste of our famous pussy juice. New friendships and crazy antics await you at the Petting Zoo.
landmark: Zebra bar with zebra striped large flag flying

name: Thunder Gumbo Camp
landmark: Large Skeletal Lobster-Whale Mutant Vehicle

name: Strong Magic
description: We are the artist support camp for "Strong Magic", a large scale flame throwing lioness sculpture made of metal.  Come by our camp to see more art!
landmark: metal sculpture of a female form out front

name: Camp Quanus
description:
Enter the Quanus
We welcome you to step through the Quanus and into the near future with us. You'll be surprised to find an even better version of yourself on the other side. Smoothies, picklebacks and quanus-y beats will tickle your senses. You may never actually leave...
landmark: 8x5 door-like structure with lights/pink fabric

name: Ballistic Bubbles Dust Patrol
description: Ballistic Bubbles, mutant army tank that blows bubbles not bombs.
landmark: Mutant army tank that blows bubbles not bombs.

name: Playful Again!
description: At Art Predator's Support Camp for Secretly Abandoned Spaces, an honorarium funded art installation by Oakland artist Valerie Mallory, stop by for conversations about this artwork, discuss Valerie's previous playa projects (Genie in the Bottle, The Bridge and the Cage, WomanTree), and color in the 10 Principles-- we have coloring books and crayons! You can also get a fresh mouth and we will teach you how to make your own mouthwash!
landmark: white VW van w tie dye pop up, tie dye banners

name: The Hotel Lobby
description: Meet us in The Hotel Lobby. With a lavish chandelier, a lux hotel bar, bellhop service, concierge desk, and a buzzing karaoke lounge, you'll be treated to 5-star service and a dusty bev in a welcoming and weird hotel lobby.
landmark: 2 containers & big "Hotel Lobby" sign

name: Cozy Cat Camp
description: Desert Propaganda Collective Camp is the support camp for Consumption, a sculpture in the shape of a dollar sign made of used household appliances.  We welcome campers who are willing to volunteer to help build and support this art piece!
landmark: Marine buoy flashing light atop a large pole

name: Hypnagogia
description: We invite you to the mystical oasis of your dreams – the place where you can experience our legendary no-power air conditioner, kick back on cozy carpets and pillows, and connect with friends new and old. Restore your body, mind & spirit while listening to enchanting music from our camp DJ's or being transported into the depths of your subconscious through guided dance meditation and yoga nidra. Our diverse mix of cultures that we represent will ensure you feel right at home, while also traveling to distant lands. Activate your creative life-force by contributing to our collaborative mural dedicated to HYPNAGOGIA – the transitional state of consciousness between wakefulness and dreamstate.
landmark: Multicolored Fabric

name: Ray's Fix It
description: Need something screwed, hammered, drilled, or pounded in the SFW sense? We have power tools! We have buckets of fix it materials and plenty of hand tools. Need duct tape? Rope? A widget for your RV? Fasteners? Glue? Bits? Clamps? Wood scraps? Come during office hours or we're open 24/7 for the DIY shop. We don't do bikes or mutant vehicles. (unless you need air, or something destroyed). Bring what you broke, and we'll try not to make it worse.
landmark: large lit up leaderboard on the curb

name: Mammoth Riders
description: Art car support for the hottest bad ass mammal on the playa! The WOODY MAMMOTH!!!!
landmark: Woolly Mammoth art car

name: Fire Bender Academy
description: Here to inspire the whole world to dance, especially with fire props! We focus on beginner classes in prop manipulation dance, fire safety, and fire dancing. We love teaching and sharing this art and want people who are curious  to start their fire prop manipulation / dance journey to have all of the resources they need so that every one can express to their fullest potential.
landmark: Giant Juggling Pins and Fire Bender Academy sign.

name: Camp Bean Water
description:
Beans, flicking, roasting, steamy dripping love, room for cream – our secret steps to the finest cup of coffee. 

Bring your brewtiful self over to Camp Bean Water to enjoy a cup and let us show you the full potential of a coffee shop. All cups of coffee our baristas serve-up come with positive affirmations. Looking for something to fill your now stimulated colon, our cooks can fry you up mouth-watering arepas. Love and good vibes are abundant in our cafe, so drip on in.

We're open every weekday morning. We have special evening events (with our secret sunset menu) like improv, game night, and body painting.
landmark: painted cafe-front with door, mirrors, framed pics

name: Y2K
description: Taking you back to then end of the last Millennium and into the New with all the Nostalgia one could ask for, and introducing you to do the idea that maybe Millennials aren't so bad!
landmark: Large Yellow AOL Man

name: Half No Sphere
description:
We will create an immersive audio lounge inside of a geodesic dome, and will host a broad variety of performances, workshops, and events throughout the week that will utilize this technology to provide visitors with a new sensory experience beyond anything they may have felt before.

There will be live musicians and bands performing, with their instruments being panned in full 360 degrees around the listeners. DJ's will be spinning tunes that fully envelop the audience, with live instruments spatialized around the room. There will be immersive sound baths, where you can wander into the dome during the day and lay down and relax while the soothing sounds transport you to another dimension. There will be workshops that invite you to learn a new skill, or be playful and silly.
landmark: 50' geodesic dome with lots of speakers inside.

name: The Nest
description:
The Nest
Come one and all to the coziest place on the playa, an actual and literal nest! But not just any nest, the ENCHANTED NEST.
landmark: To find our camp, look for the giant nest!

name: BRC Ski Resort
description: At BRC Ski Resort we believe that with great powder comes great responsibility. Come for the yoga, stay for the shot-skis! Our EXTRA terrestrial hosts are so excited to welcome the first group of earthlings to our new resort. Here you'll find all the comforts of home such as an adjusted climate and 80's inspired attire (earthlings like that, right?) All humans and monsters are welcome. Just be careful of the penguins...they bite.
landmark: Snow globe Dome with red carpet and disco snowman.

name: SOLARPUNKS
description:
We're a community of creatives and applied technologists who are harnessing the power of renewable energy to fuel our festivities. SOLARPUNKS is an exploration into what society will look like when humanity learns to wield technology to create in harmony with nature—rather than destroy it. 

We're constructing a decentralized grid of batteries and inverters to be supplied by solar PV arrays to power our camp functions. With renewable energy surpassing the cost efficiencies of fossil fuel, we're excited to energize systems-level solutions to and for fellow burners.

Inspired by our many years of participation in Burning Man, we're here to prototype and prove the viability of renewable-energy based solutions that can be expediently deployed at scale, to contribute to 2030 Sustainability Goals.
landmark: prism archway and a tall "SOLARPUNKS" flag

name: Camp BORING
description: Camp BORING: art support for BORING sign. Promoters of sarcasm and shenanigans. Come by for a sticker and a sunset sign push!
landmark: Giant BORING sign (unless it's out on the playa)

name: Outpost in the Outback
landmark: 25 foot tall pole with illuminated fish wind sock

name: Camp Bossa Samba
description: We are a camp dedicated to giving a strong dose of culture and fun and activity during Burn week. We will open our Bodega store doors at 10:00 am every morning and also host samba dancing and capoeira lessons every day from Monday-Thursday. We are mature, responsible and respect others' space and preferences.
landmark: New Zealand and Black Lives Matter flags on RV

name: Shitty Glitter
description: Restore. Nourish. Rejuvenate. Welcome to Shitty Glitter, a boutique Bed and Breakfast here to provide Black Rock City with the ultimate luxury hospitality experience. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds, changed twice daily during a performance by our team of French Canadian Maids and be sure to stick around for our continental breakfast, complete with baked goods, bacon, coffee/tea and juice. If you're in need of more, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we will be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other relaxation gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.
landmark: Three giant canopy beds with white linens

name: Beautiful Freaks
description: Interactive camp centered around playing board games with a twist.
landmark: Rubik's Cube

name: Fusion Valley
description: Burning Man's Misinformation Technology camp & home of the RatchetFish artist too! You are invited to swing by and hang out & play games with us in our public, carpeted shade. Join us for a card or tabletop game, use our internet-connected wi-fi, or try using our phone, if you dare.  Speaking of dare: Fusion Valley is proud to be the home of Black Rock Ultra Safe, the finest danger prevention agency in the land! Black Rock Ultra Safe uses cutting edge danger prevention equipment and advanced safety theory such as Safe Relativity & Quantum Safety to "Prevent all danger immediately, 1 Cone at a time!" Tune into Fusion Valley Radio at 95.7 to hear whatever it is we're playing. At night, feast your eyes on our drive-in theater of cinematic abortions. Take a load off & say hi!
landmark: Carport structures with a theater screen adjacent

name: Combat Zone
description: Late-night Chinese food and bumpin' beats
landmark: Dog-in-a-hot dog-suit sign

name: Corn'r Store
description: Welcome to the Corn'r Store! From corn dogs to corny jokes we have your corn needs covered!
landmark: Clear shiftpod with a sign saying the Crib

name: Femme Fontaine
description: Centering leisure, pleasure, and play, Femme Fontaine celebrates our unique gifts and the sensuous, expansive beauty of our inner and outer worlds. We are an oasis in the desert, a welcoming, womb-like environment designed to spark human connection.
landmark: LED Water Fountain, neon sign and lanterns!

name: MIMOSA'LYMPICS
description:
Glow-In-The-Dark games line the curbs of our camp for all to come play 24 hours/day and to interact when we're home and awake. There will be a neighborhood olympic event during the first half of Burn week, the PLAYA'LYMPICS, with camp teams, with winning camps, with prizes, and with those not victorious facing De'Feet! (With consent, of course) 

Our camp also serves as base camp for The Center of Attention interactive art project, installed between 10 and the temple near the invisible esplanade at the top of the clock, staffed at different times throughout the day and throughout the week, but not during the PLAYA'LYMPICS!!
landmark: Shade struct. on the corner, games line the street

name: Owl and the Pussycat
description: We are a small but mighty group of folx whose camp is a safe, welcoming environment for all Burners. We not only value physical comfort as seen by our cozy lounge and dining space, but emotional comfort to promote connection, conversation and reflection with our fellow Burners. We also value a good time! Come by our quiet Dream Hatchery lounge where you can take pause and meditate or join us for a tea leaf reading to ruminate on your dreams. The Owl and the Pussycat is like a warm hug for your Burn.
landmark: Owl and Pussycat Flag

name: Arkane
description: Beached on a scorched desert, Arkane is an opportunity to unlock the teachings encoded in an ancient allegory. We will voyage through movement, connection, reflection, and play as we await the Great Flood that will wash away the old ways. Our Ark home will offer a dusty & crusty poetry nook, a hypnotizing science cranny, a seawashed disco lounge, art made from up-cycled materials celebrating biodiversity (both non-human & human), and other hidden treasures. We will flow through animal-essence yoga and dance to ecstatic soundscapes. Arkane is a vessel that will offer a sanctuary to share Burners' unique and diverse stories as we move onwards into the beautiful mystery, where the waves splash against the stars.
landmark: Look for the opulent ark with a pirate flag

name: Camp Fullerene
description: The Camp Fullerene experience is about cooperation.
landmark: polyhedron shapes ranging from 6-10 ft.

name: NarCamp
description: We welcome you to share our love for music, dancing, and radical self-reliance. Come dance under the stars, enjoy a cool beverage, and watch the sunrise from camp as we dance toward the open playa. We will be dancing like it hurts to stand still Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday evenings until the early morning.
landmark: giant stretch tent with the bumping house beats.

name: ASPEN ALTERNATIVE
description: buddy camp for friends committed to leaving no trace
landmark: look for the pink and blue neon lights

name: Christmas Every Day
description: Who didn't want to have Christmas more than just once a year? It's our mission to let BRC citizens experience Christmas every day during Burning man week. We will have loving Santa and Elves, who will collect your dearest wishes. You will receive a gift and, if desired, you can leave under the Christmas tree a gift of your own for the next coming visitor. You will have a picture with Santa and will cool down with real arctic ice. You will try our Christmas Cookies! And we will host a Christmas party!
landmark: Green/red/gold decorated tent, Camp name sign

name: Bureau of Hindsight
description: A living room on the outskirts of town. A house party where all are welcome, the music is always great, and we never forget we're playing music for friends.
landmark: open-sided living room lounge lit by chandeliers.

name: Space Cowboys
hometown: Sacramento & San Francisco, California / Kelowna & Edmonton, Canada
description:
Shakin Yo Business again on the Playa!

The cowgirls and cowboys are back yet again with their version of the wild west. 

Travel the playa on the Martha - An Art Car with a personality. Martha < 3's you! An experience to the edge of the playa. 

Put on your best duds and enjoy your experience at the Space Cowboy Lounge where we barter, trade, howl, laugh, dance and share liquid libations, music and much, much more. Bring a bottle, a twelve-pack or a bag or two of ice to make your lounge hours cool and comfortable. 

Be sure to join us for the Black Rock Hoe Down, a hidden party gem.
SOMEWHERE! A party that will be out of this world.
landmark: The Space Cowboy Sign in the front of camp

name: The Cult of the Cosmic Jackalope
description: The Cult of the Cosmic Jackalope is here to consensually spread the proverbial legs of your reality and get metaphorical sand in philosophical crevices you didn't even know you had! We welcome all to hear our Good (or at least slightly above average) Word and anoint themselves in the purifying absurdity of our patented (or patent-pending) Joyously Elevated Convolutions. As Transmogrification dawns in the light of that electrically convulsant, rising Inner Light, we will sing the song of Allegorical Inanity and beseech the Jackalope Adventure Guide to appear amidst the Dust and Ephemera, to guide all Travelers who wish for direction from beyond the veil of this Illusory Reality.
landmark: Join a Cult signs.

name: Dacha
description: Safe space for you in the desert to chill and get new experiences.
landmark: a geodesic dome with a sign!

name: Jurassic Playark
description: A community of dinosaurs and humans coming together to provide an interactive experience for the residents of BRC, pulling from the best of the cretaceous, jurassic, mesozoic and modern eras to create a truly one of a kind camp experience.
landmark: Large dinosaur gate and dinos at the entrance

name: Fluffy Heaven
hometown: mamou Louisiana, tampa, Miami, Costa Rica, atlanta, alabama, Dubai, Los Angelos
description: Your fluffy fuzzy rainbow comfy sexy dream camp awaits you! Its our first year as a camp and we are oh so excited to have all of the kittens, tigers and jaguars come and play!
